mapper.select: select count(*) from approval where title like concat('%',#{key},'%') and (#{part} = '' or part = #{part})
select * from approval where title like concat ('%',#{key},'%') and (#{part} = '' or part = #{part}) order by id desc limit #{paging.displayRow} offset #{paging.startNum}
mapper.insert: insert into approval (id, userid, username, title, category, content, status, part) values (#{id}, #{userid}, #{username}, #{title}, #{category}, #{content}, #{status}, #{part})
mapper.update: update approval set status=#{status} where id = #{id}
update approval set startdate=#{startdate}, enddate=#{enddate} where id=#{id}
